channel.title: Hi! This is Adam
channel.description: Hi Folks! Nice to meet you! I am Adam. I have fourteen years of experience in the IT industry. During this time, I have been managing my own company, and I had the pleasure to create and get involved in the development of many startups. Now I am working in the acceleration program and help startups to grow. I write books and publish articles in startup magazines. In my free time, I help organisations and associations.I am a member of the scientific board of the Technical and Automation Secondary School, a member of the program board of the Technology Mixer at the University, and a member of the board of the association witch helping people with disabilities. Cheers

item.title: Hi! This is Adam
item.dc:creator: catinblack
item.description:
Hi Folks!
Nice to meet you! I am Adam. I have fourteen years of experience in the IT industry. During this time, I have been managing my own company, and I had the pleasure to create and get involved in the development of many startups. Now I am working in the acceleration program and help startups to grow. I write books and publish articles in startup magazines. In my free time, I help organisations and associations.I am a member of the scientific board of the Technical and Automation Secondary School, a member of the program board of the Technology Mixer at the University, and a member of the board of the association witch helping people with disabilities.
Cheers

Read full topic
